actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Homeland Security, and Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 50 - 1.

official_title: To require the Secretary of Transportation to issue a rule requiring access to AM broadcast stations in motor vehicles, and for other purposes.
short_title: AM Radio for Every Vehicle Act of 2025

titles.title: AM Radio for Every Vehicle Act of 2025
AM Radio for Every Vehicle Act of 2025
To require the Secretary of Transportation to issue a rule requiring access to AM broadcast stations in motor vehicles, and for other purposes.
